abstracts.cdata!:
To provide the foreign exchange required
            by private and public sector entities for the importation
            into Jamaica of raw materials, intermediate goods and
            capital equipment. The loan is intended to help Jamaica
            finance a minimum level of imports required to maintain a
            reasonable level of production in industry and agriculture,
            and to support the Government's investment program. The
            Jamaican dollar equivalent of imports financed under the
            loan would be credited to a special Loan Fund Account held
            by the Ministry of Finance and used to help finance capital
            expenditures of development projects which are supported by
            loans from external agencies.
